subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mike Pelfrey tried to appear casual as he peeked at the different doorways on his short stroll to the Mets' clubhouse from the parking lot beyond right field. Sooner or later, one of the doors on his left would be the right one, the one that would open and probably stay open for a long time.
